summary: A US drugs cop in Bucharest is up against a Russian gun and drug trafficker employing cute women and a Gypsy gang leader, who plunders, rapes and kills the young and rich. Lots of fighting and shooting.
cast: Steven Seagal|Dan Badarau|Darren Shahlavi|D. Neil Mark|George Remes|Claudiu Bleont|Madalina Mariescu|Calin Puia|Cosmina Pasarin|Alexandra Coman|Oana Jidoveanu|Izabela Onicioiu|Karl Baker|Stefan Iancu|Constantin Barbulescu|Elias Ferkin|Zoltan Butuc|Irina Antonie|Silvia Stanciu|Ioan Ionescu|Marius Chivu|Alan O'Silva|Florian Ghimpu|Kenneth Londoner|Mihael Nicolaie|Mike Dopud|Aim√©e Leigh|Pat Miller|Maria-Antoaneta Tudor
director: Director: Lauro David Chartrand-DelValle (as Lauro Chartrand)
title: Born to Raise Hell
